synopsis.text: One month after a disaster struck industrial London, reconstruction efforts are underway and a celebratory ceremony is being planned at Buckingham Palace to honor the progress and restore hope. Ars√®ne Lupin, the gentleman thief, aims to gift his friend Cardia Beckford something special to mark the fulfillment of her wish. While searching for the perfect present, Lupin becomes an unwilling participant in an elaborate jewel heist. Although innocent, he is accused of being the thief. With Lupin imprisoned, Cardia teams up with his friends and an unlikely ally. Together, they work to clear Lupin's name and uncover the true masterminds behind the jewel theft. As they investigate, it becomes clear there is more to this crime than meets the eye.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
